text: The family name Landrieu ( ) is a prominent name in the politics of the state of Louisiana, and may refer to: *Moon Landrieu (born 1930), former mayor of New Orleans 1970-1978, former Secretary of HUD in the Carter Administration 1979- 1981 and former 4th Circuit Court of appeals Judge. **Mary Landrieu (born 1955), daughter of Moon Landrieu, and a former United States Senator from Louisiana, previously served as State treasurer and house of representatives. **Mitch Landrieu (born 1960), son of Moon Landrieu and is the former mayor of New Orleans, previously served as Lieutenant Governor and State Legislator. Landrieu family
title: Landrieu family
